Message: The user completes the submission of the form
Why is ad review pending its been 4 days

I'm sorry to hear that your ad review is taking longer than expected. The ad approval process usually takes between 1-2 business days. Sometimes, it might take a bit longer due to high volume or specific review requirements. If your ad is pending due to it being a new account and not being verified, please provide the following details by emailing adsupport@newsbreak.com with the subject line: Business Verification –
- Company’s full address
- Company’s legal entity name
- Company’s EHID or DUNS number
- Primary contact person’s name
- Company’s phone number
Once we receive this information, we will conduct a thorough review and update you on your account status. We appreciate your cooperation in maintaining a secure and compliant advertising environment for all our partners.
